oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stochastic differential equations with covariant probabilities
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ryter, Dietrich
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Condensed Matter - Statistical Mechanics
Mathematical Physics
Mathematics - Probability
60H10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Covariance of the resulting probabilities requires the "anti-Ito" sense. The corresponding Fokker-Planck equation is simplified and preserves important features of the case with a constant diffusion. Multiplicative noise can always be removed by a change of the variables, which is specified explicitly.
